definition: to design/to plot/to plan out/to compose/to draw a mental sketch/conception/plan/idea/composition
to construct/to form/to make up/to compose/literary composition/paper mulberry (Broussonetia papyrifera)
variant of 構|构[gou4]/(Tw) (coll.) variant of 夠|够[gou4]/to reach by stretching

sentences.english: But scholars in the past neglected the foreign cultural factors when plot of a novel was conceived.
sentences.chinese: 而前贤忽视了这一有关构思根本的外来文化因子触媒。

sentences.english: Chapter one is the framework of multi-agent urban system.
sentences.chinese: 第一章是对城市多主体系统的理论构思。

sentences.english: Here are some ideas for spending these time gaps in purpose-filled ways
sentences.chinese: 以下是按照“目标填充法”利用零星时间的一些构思。

sentences.english: The London 2012 brand was conceived in just this spirit.
sentences.chinese: 2012年伦敦奥运会会徽的构思也源于这种精神。

sentences.english: Among the three conceptual design of Auto-gate, which one do you prefer most?
sentences.chinese: 三款构思中的闸机设计，你会较为喜欢那一款？

sentences.english: So I hope to combine forethought on that lecture with a start on the book.
sentences.chinese: 因此我希望借着开始写这本书也构思一下讲座的内容。

sentences.english: This article gives a detailed introduction to the conception of the project, the setting of ventilation shafts, etc.
sentences.chinese: 对自然通风的方案构思，通风井的设置等作详细介绍。

sentences.english: Baeyens wants to remain a child of his time.
sentences.chinese: 一旦一个技法或一个构思出现，他希望马上继续下去。

sentences.english: I spend a lot of time thinking and thinking up new and more beautiful robes for you.
sentences.chinese: 我花了很多时间不断为您构思更新更美的王袍。

sentences.english: The idea was conceived and developed in Jobs garage.
sentences.chinese: 这个想法是在乔布斯的车库里构思发展的。

sentences.english: Railway passenger station always put the passenger flow line as the focus of design ideas.
sentences.chinese: 铁路客运站历来把旅客流线作为其设计构思的重点。

sentences.english: When conceiving a story, the artists have to decide the color keys and tone of the entire movie.
sentences.chinese: 当构思故事时，动画师必须决定整部电影的色调。

sentences.english: Carson had been having a field day with the speech in his monologues.
sentences.chinese: 卡森已经忙了一整天构思在他的独脚戏中的演讲辞。
假如让你再构思自我描述会怎样呢？

sentences.english: The conception on an insertion mechanism of nonrigid flat inserts was firstly suggested by us.
sentences.chinese: 首次提出了片状非刚性嵌件安放机构的设计构思。

definition: to create/to produce/to write/creative work/creation/CL:個|个[ge4]
inspiration/insight/a burst of creativity in scientific or artistic endeavor
like a heavenly steed, soaring across the skies (idiom)/(of writing, calligraphy etc) bold and imaginative/unconstrained in style
to put pen to paper/pen mark
